STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: UI_SKILLWND_ON_INIT(UISelf); local lwMain = GetUIWnd("FormHero") if lwMain:IsNil() == false then local lwBG = lwMain:GetControl("SFRM_HPMP_BG") if lwBG:IsNil() == false then local lwLV = lwBG:GetControl("FRM_LV") if lwLV:IsNil() == false then lwLV:OffTwinkle() local img = lwLV:GetControl("IMG_TWINKLE") ODS("----------22222222222\n") if false == img:IsNil() then ODS("----------11111111111\n") img:Visible(false) end end end end

FORM.SCRIPT:
local kUISelf = UISelf SetSkillIconBlink_InMainUI(false) CloseToolTip() kUISelf:ClearAllListItem() UI_SKILLWND_REFRESH(kUISelf) local lwMain = GetUIWnd("FormHero") if lwMain:IsNil() == false then local lwBG = lwMain:GetControl("SFRM_HPMP_BG") if lwBG:IsNil() == false then local lwLV = lwBG:GetControl("FRM_LV") if lwLV:IsNil() == false then lwLV:OffTwinkle() local img = lwLV:GetControl("IMG_TWINKLE") if false == img:IsNil() then img:Visible(false) end end end end local lwLvUpClickWnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_LVUPCLICK") if lwLvUpClickWnd:IsNil() == false then lwLvUpClickWnd:Close() end
UI_SkillCallDisplayInit(kUISelf)

CloseToolTip() local kSkillTree = GetSkillTree() kSkillTree:ResetTemporary() local lwMain = GetUIWnd("FormHero") if lwMain:IsNil() == false then local lwBG = lwMain:GetControl("SFRM_HPMP_BG") if lwBG:IsNil() == false then local lwLV = lwBG:GetControl("FRM_LV") if lwLV:IsNil() == false then lwLV:OffTwinkle() local img = lwLV:GetControl("IMG_TWINKLE") if false == img:IsNil() then img:Visible(false) end end end end local lwLvUpClickWnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_LVUPCLICK") if lwLvUpClickWnd:IsNil() == false then lwLvUpClickWnd:Close() end

local kSelf = UISelf CheckGuidMsg(kSelf) if false == CallHelpBasicSkillSet(31, true) then if false == CallHelpBasicSkillSet(32, true) then if false == CallHelpBasicSkillSet(31, false) then CallHelpBasicSkillSet(32, false) end end end

BUTTON.HOTKEY: local kSkillTree = GetSkillTree() kSkillTree:ConfirmTemporary() return true

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kViewUI = GetUIWnd("SFRM_JOB_SKILL_VIEW") if false == kViewUI:IsNil() then CloseUI("SFRM_JOB_SKILL_VIEW") return else CallJobSkillViewUI() return end
local kViewUI = GetUIWnd("SFRM_ITEM_SKILL") if false == kViewUI:IsNil() then CloseUI("SFRM_ITEM_SKILL") return else CallItemSkillUI() return end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: if 1 == Config_GetValue(HEADKEY_ETC, "USE_OLD_COMBO") then UISelf:CheckState(false) else UISelf:CheckState(true) end
if false == UISelf:GetCheckState() then Config_SetValue(HEADKEY_ETC, "USE_OLD_COMBO", 0 ) else Config_SetValue(HEADKEY_ETC, "USE_OLD_COMBO", 1 ) end Config_ApplyConfig() Config_Save(false)

ANI_BAR.SCRIPT: UISelf:DisplayTimeBar(false) local wndspk = UISelf:GetControl("IMG_SPARK") if wndspk:IsNil() == false then local inow = UISelf:GetBarNow() local imax = UISelf:GetBarMax() local iw = UISelf:GetSize():GetX() local ix = inow/imax*iw if 0 >= inow then wndspk:SetLocation(Point2(-30, -28)) else wndspk:SetLocation(Point2(ix-30, -28)) end end

IMG.SCRIPT: if GetAccumTime() - g_fSparkTime > 0.05 then local iNow = UISelf:GetUVIndex() g_fSparkTime = GetAccumTime() iNow = iNow + 1 if iNow > 3 then iNow = 1 end UISelf:SetUVIndex(iNow) end

ICON.SCRIPT: if true == CheckUseSkillSetWnd(UISelf, true) then UISelf:IconDoAction() end
if true == CheckUseSkillSetWnd(UISelf, true) then UISelf:IconToCursor() end
if true == CheckUseSkillSetWnd(UISelf, true) then UISelf:IconDoAction() end
if true == CheckUseSkillSetWnd(UISelf, true) then UISelf:IconToCursor() end
